name: Ring of Despair
description:
[FREE DEMO AVAILABLE BELOW]

[EARLY ACCESS] [0.4.0]

INTRODUCTION

Ring of Despair is a 2D action-platformer game where you play as a little girl named Christy, who lost her parents when she was young due to a demonic attack. Her mother's head was taken as a part of a certain demon's "beautiful adult woman head" collection, as well as her own head when she reach 18 years old, in the case that she is not strong enough to kill the demon yet.

Due to a fortunate incident, she found a mystical ring that was apparently, inheritance of a certain angel's soul. The soul of the ring promises her to help the demon-slaying mission.

(last updated : AUGUST 14th, 2018)

FEATURES

  • Great story that won't make you regret
  • Find power-up to increase your stats permanently
  • Equip 4 rings of your choice to boost your performance
  • Boost power temporarily with 'Angel Trigger'
  • Attempt to defeat hard bosses

THINGS SCHEDULED/DESIRED FOR FUTURE BUILD

  • More story development
  • More quest to do
  • Town(s) and more NPC
  • More place to access
  • More power-up to pick
  • Minigames
  • Approximately 20~50 hours of gameplay when the game is finished

Be aware that this game is still on early stage, so you may find some errors; and the story-telling, quest, things, features, musics, and sound effects are not completed yet. By buying this game here, you will support the game's development and may result to a better game in future.

All kinds of support are appreciated. Thank you very much for supporting the game's development!

Free and paid version is currently the same, but Free version will only be available up to v0.5.0 of the game.

The paid version's minimum price will be increased a bit by bit on each update, up to the suggested price.
